article:
Lara was dying to discover how college could benefit her. Day after day, she sat in the  _  , waiting for something her professors said to have a(n)  _  . By the end of the semester nothing  _  had happened and she was  _  . She approached one of her  _  and asked, "Is this all there is?" The teacher looked at her for a moment and answered, "For you, apparently so."
As simple as it is, this story contains an important  _  for all potential students to learn: you cannot depend entirely on others to  _  you. If you do, you will get  _  with the education system with its inefficiencies and imperfections. You'll enjoy your educational experience more and get more  _  if you realize that  _  education is self-education, as it is you who  _  how much and how well you will learn.
Learning is a partnership of two or more willing minds. Your teachers can  _  you with information and guidance, but much of the responsibility to learn is on your  _  . If you welcome this  _  , you will exercise more control over your  _  experience, both in and out of the classroom. Then, even if some of your instructors  _  to meet their responsibilities in the partnership, you can still  _  the situation from your side.
Having more control will make you feel more fully involved, and feeling more involved will make you more  _  about your education;  as a result  , you will not only increase your capacity to learn but will probably  _  the process more. You will also experience a greater sense of freedom and direction.
